# Storefront Instructions

Scope:

- `frontend/src/app/pages/home/**`
- `frontend/src/app/pages/shop/**`
- `frontend/src/app/pages/blog/**`
- `frontend/src/app/pages/product/**`
- `frontend/src/app/pages/cart/**`
- `frontend/src/app/pages/checkout/**`

Rules:

- Prioritize conversion clarity over control density.
- Keep one clear primary CTA per viewport region.
- Avoid admin-like tooling in storefront pages.
- Keep SEO surface deterministic:
  - title/meta/canonical/robots/H1 must remain consistent.
- Flag nested scroll regions and sticky overload as high-priority UX debt.
